channel.title: Private Server Question, maybe somebody can lend me a hand?
channel.description:
I've been reading up on tutorials and I've almost got my Private server done. I have already gotten everything from No-IP and configured my Windows firewall, and everything else that the Tuts. said to do. There is only one problem, whenever I try to log into my server it says "Error connecting to server". I put in the right server name and everything, is there actually a start button or what. Thanks. :)
-dave

item.title: Private Server Question, maybe somebody can lend me a hand?
item.dc:creator: @bluebort bluebort
item.description:
@bluebort wrote:

when i started i couldnt connect to the no-ip hostname so i used hamachi… it works
use the number at the top ex. 5.194.241.293 (not mine, sorry for whoevers it is)
and other people should be able to log on

Read full topic
item.source: Private Server Question, maybe somebody can lend me a hand?

item.title: Private Server Question, maybe somebody can lend me a hand?
item.dc:creator: @usafoxx usafoxx
item.description:
@usafoxx wrote:

yeah i found out how to get onto my private server, now just getting my friends on. i signed up with no-ip and the hostname is hostilescape.no-ip.org

whenever i try it, it doesnt connect. do i have to link the server and no-ip somehow?

thanks,

dave

Read full topic
item.source: Private Server Question, maybe somebody can lend me a hand?

item.title: Private Server Question, maybe somebody can lend me a hand?
item.dc:creator: @Sleep Sleep
item.description:
@Sleep wrote:

type in ‘localhost’ for the IP or leave it blank

Read full topic
